lines: scotch® outdoor mounting tape mounts securely, yet removes easily and cleanly without damage on most walls and surfaces
scotch® mounting tape, 4011c, 25.4 mm x 1.5 m
this tape adheres exceptionally well to textured surfaces such as cement and brick, and holds items weighing up to five pounds.
scotch® outdoor mounting tape, 4011c, 1 in x 60 in x 0.045 in (2.54 cm x 1.52 m x 0.11 cm)
can be used on both exterior and interior surfaces
enjoy hassle-free mounting for the home and office
mount securely, yet remove easily without damage on most walls and other surfaces
